titleInfo.title: Meyer v. Nava et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 43 Motion for Partial Summary Judgment. Plaintiff is entitled to judgment on her claims against defendant Christopher Nava. The issue of damages and liability of the other defendants remain to be determined . Signed by Judge Richard D. Rogers on 9/12/05. (meh)

titleInfo.title: Meyer v. Nava et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER denying 46 Motion to Appoint Counsel, granting 47 Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis, and setting Final Pretrial Conference, by telephone, on 6/22/2006, at 1:30 p.m. The parties' revised proposed pretrial order is due to chambers by 6/16/2006. See Memorandum and Order for details. Signed by Magistrate Judge K. Gary Sebelius on 5/30/2006. (djs)

titleInfo.title: Meyer v. Nava et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 62 Motion by defendants Board of County Commissioners of Lyon County, KS and Sheriff Gary Eichorn, for Summary Judgment; Judgment is hereby entered for these defendants on all claims asserted by plaintiff. Granting 72 Plaintiff's Motion to Amend/Correct the pretrial order to assert a claim against the defendants based upon the Eighth Amendment. Signed by Judge Richard D. Rogers on 8/30/07. (meh )

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 5:04-cv-04099; Meyer v. Nava et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Kansas

titleInfo.title: Meyer v. Nava et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that plaintiff be awarded damages of $1,750,589.00 against defendant Christopher Nava in his individual capacity. This amount consists of $750,589.00 in compensatory damages and $1,000,000.00 in punitive damages. IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that plaintiff be awarded attorney's fees pursuant to 42 U.S.C. 1988. Plaintiff's counsel shall submit documentation in support of their request for fees within 10 days of the date of this order. Signed by Judge Richard D. Rogers on 10/17/07.(meh)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 5:04-cv-04099; Meyer v. Nava et al;

Plaintiff's counsel shall submit documentation in support of their request for fees within 10 days of the date of this order. Signed by Judge Richard D. Rogers on 10/17/07.(meh)

titleInfo.title: Meyer v. Nava et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting in part and denying in part 105 Motion for Attorney Fees. The court hereby awards attorneys' fees to the plaintiff in the amount of $102,320.00. Signed by District Judge Richard D. Rogers on 1/3/08. (meh)
